DSN Electric Pressure Cooker is a brand-new kitchen tool developed using our latest technology. The product has combined the fine qualities of the pressure cooker, electric cooker and braising cooker. It features programmable temperature and pressure control with new and distinctive structure and outlook design. It is reliable and safe operate, power saving and delivers quality cooking. It is an ideal cooking tool for a modern family and an excellent substitute for conventional pressure cooker.

Combined functions of cooking, stewing and braising. The time range is labeled on the knob. You can it according to food and personal taste and cooking experience.

Time and Power Saving. Power and time saved by over 60% then common electric cookers.

Airtight cooking retains nutrient and original taste.

Non-stick inner pot, easy to clean. Stainless lid and outer tank ensure long service life.

5 built-in safety features:

1) Lid Auto Lock: The cooker cannot gain pressure when the lid is not well closed and the lid cannot be opened when the inner pressure is too high.

2) Pressure Auto-Relief function: When temperature and pressure inside the cooker go beyond the normal value, the pressure discharging valve will discharge the steam to regulate.

3) De-Pressure function: When pressure limit inside cooker fails and pressure goes beyond the limit, cooker automatically de-pressures around the lid to avoid an explosion.

4) Temperature Limit: Power automatically cut offs when temperature inside cooker goes beyond preset temperature.

5) Ultra-high Temperature Safe: Power automatically cut offs when temperature inside cooker goes beyond limit value.

Product Safety Approved by CE International
CERT NO : AE 50491939 0001

1 year warranty on manufacturing defects. This warranty is applicable within Peninsular Malaysia only. Product sold to East Malaysia will not be covered by this warranty

DSN Electric Pressure Cooker is a brand-new kitchen tool developed using our latest technology. The product has combined the fine qualities of the pressure cooker, electric cooker and braising cooker. It features programmable temperature and pressure control with new and distinctive structure and outlook design. It is reliable and safe operate, power saving and delivers quality cooking. It is an ideal cooking tool for a modern family and an excellent substitute for conventional pressure cooker.

Combined functions of cooking, stewing and braising. The time range is labeled on the knob. You can it according to food and personal taste and cooking experience.

Time and Power Saving. Power and time saved by over 60% then common electric cookers.

Airtight cooking retains nutrient and original taste.

Non-stick inner pot, easy to clean. Stainless lid and outer tank ensure long service life.

5 built-in safety features:

1) Lid Auto Lock: The cooker cannot gain pressure when the lid is not well closed and the lid cannot be opened when the inner pressure is too high.

2) Pressure Auto-Relief function: When temperature and pressure inside the cooker go beyond the normal value, the pressure discharging valve will discharge the steam to regulate.

3) De-Pressure function: When pressure limit inside cooker fails and pressure goes beyond the limit, cooker automatically de-pressures around the lid to avoid an explosion.

4) Temperature Limit: Power automatically cut offs when temperature inside cooker goes beyond preset temperature.

5) Ultra-high Temperature Safe: Power automatically cut offs when temperature inside cooker goes beyond limit value.

Product Safety Approved by CE International
CERT NO : AE 50491939 0001

(NO TEMPERATURE ADJUST)

Operation  Methods:
1. Remove the packaging of the appliance and clean it before using it.
2. Put the multifunction cooker on a stable and flat surface.
3. Connect the plug to the power socket and switch on the multifunction cooker.
4. Press â€œfunctionâ€ key to select the required function. There are six functions to choose which are noodles, porridge, keep warm, soup, hotpot / saute. During the selection process, the indicator light corresponding to the selected function flashes, indicating that the corresponding function will be carried out. The light indicator will flash for 3 seconds and then automatically carry out the selected function.
5. To cancel the current operation, users may press the button of â€œCancelâ€.
6. After finish cooking, switch off the multifunction cooker and unplug it for cleaning.

Cleaning & Maintenance: 
1. Switch off and unplug the multifunction cooker after finish cooking.
2. Let it to cool down for few minutes before cleaning.
3. No special cleaning agents are required for cleaning the appliance. Use warm water with washing liquid, soft cloth or sponge to clean the product and wipe it with a dry cloth.
4. Always ensure any excess liquid is thoroughly wiped off after cleaning and any spillage is immediately wiped dry.
5. Do not use harsh abrasive cleaners or sharp metal scrapers to clean the multifunction cooker since they can scratch the surface.
6. Never soak or immerse the multifunction cooker in water for cleaning as it may damage the multifunction cooker.
7. After cleaning it, let it to dry before keeping the appliance for storage.

Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)

1. Does this induction cooker utilize magnetic waves or infrared? 
This model is a magnetic induction cooker whereby it gets hot once the metal pots touches the surface and when the pots are removed, it's safe to touch the surface unlike the infrared cooker which gets immediately hot once it's been started. 

2. For infrared induction cooker there is no selection of pot?
Yes, the heat is directly transfer to the pot, which the surface of the induction cooker will be hot, while magnetic induction cooker only surface of the pot will be hot.

3. What is the maximum usage time?
Maximum time is up to 3 hours.

4. Is this model one suitable for deep frying?
It is suitable for deep frying when using a suitable pan.

5. What are the diameter of pans that can be used on this model? 
You may use pans with the diameter of 12 - 26cm.

description:
Sous vide cooking is quite versatile and allows you to cook a wide range of proteins and produce. Some of the foods that benefit most from sous vide are steak, different types of fish, pork shoulder and a wide range of vegetables.Sous Vide cooking is one of the hottest new trends in food preparation. Cook evenly, ensuring that the inside is properly cooked without overcooking the outside.

Now BioloMix launched the cutting edge 5th Generation Flagship model SV-9008 Sous vide cooker, it's perfect choice for sous vide lovers to help you cook like a pro. and bring Restaurant Quality Food to Home. Thanks to IPX7 Waterproof and Smart Wi-fi App control with built-in recipes, It would free you from the kitchen and have more time with families and friends during cooking.

Features:
Precision Temperature and Timer: BioloMix 5th gen sous vide makes the temperature accuracy to Â±0.1Â°C. Intelligent wide range of temperature (0-90Â°C) and time control (Max 59:59). With precise temperature and time control, the food will maintain the best taste, more nutrients and
vitamins.

Two Operation Methods: Touch Button with 4 presets (Steak/Fish/Chicken/Vegetables) or Remote Control Through Mobile APP Operation: You can control the digital slow cooker by touching the smart control panel, or make the sous vide work with the â€œ Tuya smart â€œ APP. You can download the App in Google Play or in APP Store for WIFI Connection, use the APP on your phone to control the precision cooker.

360Â° Fast Heat Circulation: Sous vide immersion circulator with a 360Â° heat circulation stainless steel pump. It transfers heat efficiently.
Water temperature is kept constant. The fiber of food will not be destroyed.

IPX7 Waterproofï¼šSous vide is IPX7 waterproof certified. There is no risk of steam entering to the internal parts and hence has long durability and safety!

Simply attach the precision cooker to the container, add water, put foods in a sealed bag, and press power button 3 seconds to turn on and start cooking with the touch of a button on the device. The sous vide cooker's timer and precise temperature control allow you to step away and relax while your food cooks perfectly.

Protection & Safety Design: Overheating and Low water level protection, the sous vide cooker stops working automatically when the water level goes below the min mark. No fuss, no noise, Best deal to bring professional cooking to home.
